description: Love at first sight, a four-leaf clover, a crimp in Rifle, a climber without tendonitis—some things are rare to find—the Ghost Whisperer™ UL Jacket is, too. Made with 1000-fill RDS®-certified down, a limited, time-sensitive resource that uses only the highest quality plumes from the down selection, this jacket raises the bar as the lightest, fully featured insulated layer ever created. So, if you're going to go ultralight, don't hold back: opt into the best-available insulation before it's gone.
name: Mountain Hardwear Ghost Whisperer UL Hoody - Mens

specs.value: 1000-fill RDS®-certified down - 90% Goose Down, 10% Goose Feathers
